pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: 技術革新は情報産業に急速な進歩をもたらした。
lessons.english: Technological innovation brought about the rapid progress of the information industry.

lessons.japanese: 技術革新のおかげで、その工場の最大生産量は２倍になった。
lessons.english: Thanks to the technological innovation, the maximum output of the factory has doubled.

lessons.japanese: オープンソースは技術革新をドライブするエンジンである。
lessons.english: Open source is the engine that drives technological innovation.

lessons.japanese: 医学の革新は苦痛から私たちを取り除く最良の方法です。
lessons.english: Medical innovations are the best way to relieve us from sufferings.

lessons.english: Medical innovations are the best way to relieve us from sufferings.

lessons.japanese: 選挙では、保守派と革新派がせめぎ合った。
lessons.english: In the election, conservatives and progressives were fighting each other.
